sun life financial inc. has suffered a third-quarter net loss of$ 396 million," significantly impacted by a deterioration in global capital markets. the loss reported tuesday was 71 cents per share, down from year-ago net income of$ 577 million or$ 1.00 per share. the latest quarter included of$ 636 million, including charges on previously disclosed exposure to lehman brothers, washington mutual and american international group. there also were$ 326 million of charges related to equity market declines. unprecedented events in the global financial sector characterized the third quarter and significantly impacted our results, "commented ceo Donald Stewart ." despite these extraordinary occurrences, sun life is well positioned to manage through this challenging economic environment
